resources.string:
Hi, my name is Peter. 

I am a programmer and computer scientist who loves everything about programming. 

The different programming languages I know include Python, C, C++, C#, Java, Swift, and several others. 

Programming is actually a fun and relaxing activity for me, even when I run into frustrating bugs! 

When I am not programming I also enjoy playing the guitar and working out. 

Thanks for checking out my app!
